text:
Two months later, the story broke internationally. An anonymous leak published the entire archive on decentralized media platforms. Catalina resurfaced briefly through a digital interview, using voice masking software. Her identity remained concealed. Marcellus and Anna never met in person after the operation concluded. Their digital footprints were wiped, their temporary email accounts closed. But one last message remained in Anna's inbox:
From: m.grant512@tuta.io
They'll chase shadows now. 
Stay low. You were brilliant. 
â€“ M.
